title: Hawks of Outremer
description: A Cormac Fitzgeoffrey adventure.The Cormac series is here collected for the first time, and it consists of three tales: 'Hawks of Outremer,' 'The Blood of Belshazzar,' and 'The Slave-Princess,' the latter coming down to us in near-complete form and finished by Richard L. Tierney.
author: Robert E. Howard
